Reviews.Title: sux
Reviews.Author: joe z
Reviews.Content: this item is the worst thing I have ever seen. I have thrown away my money before, but this is nuts. The camera doesn't work even though I tried many times to follow the instructions which are in poor English. Don't I repeat don't waste your money on this thing !!! If you want to throw away your money you can sent it to me and get an email thanking you. This is more than what you will get from this piece of trash !!!

Reviews.Title: Not a happy purchase
Reviews.Content: Received the product very quickly, however, after trying to use it, powered it for 24 hours to charge the battery, it would not retain its memory and I would have to reset the time (over and over and over).  Product appeared to be very cheaply made, despite it's cost.  Never even got to try whether it made videos or pictures due to the above problem.  Would definitely not recommend.  Return went fairly smoothly though.

Reviews.Title: Disorganisation
Reviews.Author: G.D.GOTT
Reviews.Content: When I open the unit I've looked for the Owners Manual in order to start it up. My surprise: the Manual inside the box is for a PEN VIDEO RECORDER. Isn't it incredible? Now, here I am in Brazil, where I'll stay working for about 4 months and cannot use the unit because it is very difficult to operate without an Owners Manual. What can I do now?

Reviews.Title: Parts missing, parts wrong, instructions useless
Reviews.Author: W. Ward "Bodhran rookie"
Reviews.Content: Ordered 2.  They came on time.  That was the only good part.  Both were missing the SD card.  Both came with a non US charger even though the seller and the buyer are in the US.  The instructions were written in English words by a non-English speaker, and made no sense.  I emailed back and forth with them and finally got an address to ship them back to.  It wasted a lot of my time, and they told me they "might" cover the shipping cost for the return postage.  I don't recommend this seller.

Reviews.Title: Motion camera not working
Reviews.Author: Alfredo
Reviews.Content: I wish I can return this back or exchange. No sounds, motion camera is not working, remote control is not working too.

Reviews.Title: sucks
Reviews.Author: BR7
Reviews.Content: do not buy. it can only stay charged for 30 min. it can't  connect with a computer and it works bad as a clock

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: Mike Wood
Reviews.Content: Junk, waste of money, makes too noise(voice), poor instructions, hard to read, wish I could get my money back, unhappy.

Reviews.Title: A word of caution...
Reviews.Author: James G Feulner
Reviews.Content: The instructions were written by someone who didn't have full command of the english language-at best- and when I began downloading the program on my laptop, my scanning software stopped it due to "Trogan Program Detected" on the provided software.

Reviews.Title: Package was Light
Reviews.Author: Dawn Gallagher "Dawn Waynick Gallagher"
Reviews.Content: The Clock was great until I opened it. It worked good as an annoying clock, thats about it.  It was supposed to come with a remote to control and activate the motion activated camera.  However mine didn't, and it wasn't opened before I received it as far as I can tell. It was wrapped and sealed like it was shipped from the factory, yet it didn't have the remote at all. And because of this, it only can be used as a clock that talks the time every hour on the hour.  Thats all I can say

Reviews.Title: motion camera dissapointment
Reviews.Author: lori kimball
Reviews.Content: the remote sticks to the point your not sure if the camera is working or not.  The directions are written so small it is almost impossible to read them, plus the directions are hard to follow.

Reviews.Title: cheap
Reviews.Author: Doug Looney
Reviews.Content: You get what you pay for.  I did not expect much for the price and I did not get much.

Reviews.Title: Poor Quality
Reviews.Author: John K
Reviews.Content: This product is a nice alarm clock but not a good nanny cam.The motion sensor is only good if you are 3 feet away. Waste of money. I am in the process of trying to return it to the shipper but it will cost me almost as much to ship back as it was to purchase. The shipper does not return e-mail.

Reviews.Title: Not a working device
Reviews.Author: DIckW
Reviews.Content: The software provided would not load onto my Windows 7 CPU or onto my Windows 98 ancient laptop. Got a clock, even the alarm would not work without the software, that was very pricy. Amazon did provide a prepaid return shipping label and a refund but I lost what looked like a good bargain.

Reviews.Title: Groan!
Reviews.Author: Daniel R. Oestreich
Reviews.Content: Recieved product, however, after reading instructions written by a translation program o discovered it was missing the card reader and the mini sd card. Also missing the black dingus for connecting to the cord. Not even sure it works. I also do not see even a NON US CHARGER others have written about in reviews. Good news?!? Well I got it for 43.00....lol.

Reviews.Title: A piece of junk
Reviews.Author: Martin Vaughn
Reviews.Content: I can not believe that this piece of junk would be sold on Amazon. It did not work and the software that came with it had a virus on it. It took me two hours to get it off my computer. I had to do a restore and run my virus program three times to get it clean. I wouldn't give this thing to a kid to play with.

Reviews.Title: MotionActivated High Resolution Portable Mini Clock Hidden Camera Nannycam
Reviews.Author: L. LeJeune
Reviews.Content: This is definately NOT worth the money I paid, just a high priced toy. Not a very good one at that. The bonus 4GB SD card quit working within the first week. The room needs to be brightly lit to record. No instructions to speak of are provided and the ones that are, are not clear at all.

Reviews.Title: Did not work as advertised
Reviews.Author: J. Abrams
Reviews.Content: I could not get this device to work as a motion detector. The directions are obviously translated and very hard to follow. Even when I thought I got it right, it was hard to see the status lights, and the recording was always on, not motion-activated like it was supposed to be. Whoever designed this has a very weird sense of how things should work. Maybe if someone who knows good English would write a comprehensive user manual, the product could be usable. As it was, I had to return it.

Reviews.Title: unsure
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: I want to buy one but I'm not up for it not working ..arghh too many bad reviews. Too bad for this item I'm not buying this

Reviews.Title: Not here yet
Reviews.Author: matt dillon
Reviews.Content: have not received it yet. will rate it when it gets here.I think it will work hope it is easy to use.
